page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT AROUND OSSINGTON.
page.content: Approximately one half of the working population are employed within the block. These mainly consist of the farming community,{farmworkers}and {gamekeepers. The people who live in the area, but work elsewhere range from {teachers, office workers, nurses }and {hairdressers}to{power station {opperatives. Although unemployment is a major problem nationally, there seems to be a niche somewhere for most of the local workforce. The{labour relations}in this area are quite stable, no massive strikes although there are occasionly {repercussions}felt here from {industrial action}taken elsewhere.
